artist: Artist: John Furnival; Author: Thomas Meyer; Publisher: Circle Press, Guildford, England
catalogue_raissonne: Cont. Artists 321-322; Cooking the Books : Ron King and Circle Press, p. 172
creditline: Gift of funds from Mary Ann Sharp
description: Book with ten etched vignettes illustrating the legends of Theseus and the Minotaur and Hercules and Omphale, each surrounded by blind-embossed maze designs inserted into ten four-page sections (28 x 39 cm) on Somerset Book mould-made paper, with text printed letterpress; each book includes an extra watercolored print, inserted into grey cloth cover and black slip-case.
medium: Etchings with blind embossing, letterpress; bound volume
provenance: Martin S. Ackerman Foundation, New York (agent); given to MIA, 1980.
signed: Each print initialed in pencil by the artist; also signed in pencil on the colophon page: John Furnival
title: Blind Date
